text: Peter Robert Tyler Thorburn (19 March 1939 – 26 January 2021) was a New Zealand rugby union player and coach. He was born in Auckland. He played as a flanker. He played for Auckland until 1985. He coached North Harbour in New Zealand from 1985 to 1991. He later coached Bristol (2001–03) and later the United States national team (2006–07). Thorburn in Takapuna on 26 January 2021. He was 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:New Zealand rugby union coaches Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Peter Thorburn
